resources.string: Please set the alarm time to begin tracking the best moment to wake you up.
It seems too early to go to sleep. \n\nMovements tracking automatically begins on 8 hours before the alarm time.
Click Start tracking button when you are ready to go to bed.
Searching for the best wake-up moment. \n\nPut the phone somewhere on your bed and have a good night!

Smart Alarm Clock finds the optimal time to wake up according sleep stage monitoring. \n\nPlease run this program to set the alarm time, and then take your phone to bed at night. Do not tie the phone to your body, just put it on the surface of the bed.

Smart Alarm Clock finds the optimal time to wake up according sleep stage monitoring; just take your phone to bed at night and the alarm will go off right after the end of your last dream. 

This trial version will expire March 1, 2010.

Click the menu to access additional options.
It seems that native alarm clock is currently active and may interfere with Smart Alarm Clock.
Native alarm clock has been turned off
This application version has expired. Please install fresh version from Android Market
